DOC.brief_summary: An uncontrolled feasibility study on using mouth piece ventilation in palliation of dyspnea in subjects with incurable advanced disease. Subjects are recruited from a local Hospice and from oncology ward. The main outcomes are the compliance of the subjects with the treatment and alleviation of dyspnea during the treatment period.
DOC.brief_title: Palliation of Dyspnea With Mouth Piece Ventilation
